options.label: Playername (Single Player)
options.tooltip: How you want to be addressed in Single Player matches.

options.label: Playername (Multiplayer)
options.tooltip: How you want to be addressed in Multiplayer matches (except lobby).

options.label: Background Pause
options.tooltip: Pause single player games when window loses focus.

options.label: Enable Welcome Screen
options.tooltip: If you disable it, the welcome screen will still appear once, each time a new version is available. You can always launch it from the main menu.

options.label: Network Warnings
options.tooltip: Show which player has a bad connection in multiplayer games.

options.label: FPS Overlay
options.tooltip: Show frames per second in top right corner.

options.label: Realtime Overlay
options.tooltip: Show current system time in top right corner.

options.label: Gametime Overlay
options.tooltip: Show current simulation time in top right corner.

options.label: Ceasefire Time Overlay
options.tooltip: Always show the remaining ceasefire time.

options.label: Late Observer Joins
options.tooltip: Allow everybody or buddies only to join the game as observer after it started.

options.label: Observer Limit
options.tooltip: Prevent further observers from joining if the limit is reached.

options.label: Chat Timestamp
options.tooltip: Show time that messages are posted in the lobby, gamesetup and ingame chat.

label: Graphics
tooltip: Set the balance between performance and visual appearance.

options.label: Windowed Mode
options.tooltip: Start 0 A.D. in a window.

options.label: Prefer GLSL
options.tooltip: Use OpenGL 2.0 shaders (recommended).

options.label: Fog
options.tooltip: Enable Fog.

options.label: Post Processing
options.tooltip: Use screen-space postprocessing filters (HDR, Bloom, DOF, etc).

options.label: Shader Effects
options.tooltip: Number of shader effects. REQUIRES GAME RESTART

options.label: Shadows
options.tooltip: Enable shadows.

options.label: Shadow Quality
options.tooltip: Shadow map resolution. High values can crash the game when using a graphics card with low memory!

options.label: Shadow Filtering
options.tooltip: Smooth shadows.

options.label: Unit Silhouettes
options.tooltip: Show outlines of units behind buildings.

options.label: Particles
options.tooltip: Enable particles.

options.label: Water Effects
options.tooltip: When OFF, use the lowest settings possible to render water. This makes other settings irrelevant.

options.label: HQ Water Effects
options.tooltip: Use higher-quality effects for water, rendering coastal waves, shore foam, and ships trails.

options.label: Real Water Depth
options.tooltip: Use actual water depth in rendering calculations.

options.label: Water Reflections
options.tooltip: Allow water to reflect a mirror image.

options.label: Water Refraction
options.tooltip: Use a real water refraction map and not transparency.

options.label: Shadows on Water
options.tooltip: Cast shadows on water.

options.label: Smooth LOS
options.tooltip: Lift darkness and fog-of-war smoothly.

options.label: Show Sky
options.tooltip: Render Sky.

options.label: VSync
options.tooltip: Run vertical sync to fix screen tearing. REQUIRES GAME RESTART

options.label: FPS Throttling in Menus
options.tooltip: To save CPU workload, throttle render frequency in all menus. Set to maximum to disable throttling.

options.label: FPS Throttling in Games
options.tooltip: To save CPU workload, throttle render frequency in running games. Set to maximum to disable throttling.

options.label: Master Volume
options.tooltip: Master audio gain.

options.label: Music Volume
options.tooltip: In game music gain.

options.label: Ambient Volume
options.tooltip: In game ambient sound gain.

options.label: Action Volume
options.tooltip: In game unit action sound gain.

options.label: UI Volume
options.tooltip: UI sound gain.

options.label: Nick Notification
options.tooltip: Receive audio notification when someone types your nick.

options.label: Enable Game Setting Tips
options.tooltip: Show tips when setting up a game.

options.label: Enable Settings Panel Slide
options.tooltip: Slide the settings panel when opening, closing or resizing.

options.label: Persist Match Settings
options.tooltip: Save and restore match settings for quick reuse when hosting another game.

options.label: Default AI Difficulty
options.tooltip: Default difficulty of the AI.

options.label: Default AI Behavior
options.tooltip: Default behavior of the AI.

options.label: Assign Players
options.tooltip: Automatically assign joining clients to free player slots during the match setup.

label: Lobby
tooltip: These settings only affect the multiplayer.

options.label: TLS Encryption
options.tooltip: Protect login and data exchanged with the lobby server using TLS encryption.

options.label: Chat Backlog
options.tooltip: Number of backlogged messages to load when joining the lobby.

options.label: Game Rating Column
options.tooltip: Show the average rating of the participating players in a column of the gamelist.

label: In-Game
tooltip: Change options regarding the in-game settings.

options.label: Wounded Unit Health
options.tooltip: The wounded unit hotkey considers the selected units as wounded if their health percentage falls below this number.

options.label: Batch Training Size
options.tooltip: Number of units trained per batch by default.

options.label: Scroll Batch Increment Ratio
options.tooltip: Number of times you have to scroll to increase/decrease the batchsize by 1.

options.label: Chat Notification Attack
options.tooltip: Show a chat notification if you are attacked by another player.

options.label: Chat Notification Tribute
options.tooltip: Show a chat notification if an ally tributes resources to another team member if teams are locked, and all tributes in observer mode.

options.label: Chat Notification Barter
options.tooltip: Show a chat notification to observers when a player bartered resources.

options.label: Chat Notification Phase
options.tooltip: Show a chat notification if you or an ally have started, aborted or completed a new phase, and phases of all players in observer mode.

options.label: Attack Range Visualization
options.tooltip: Display the attack range of selected defensive structures (can also be toggled in-game with the hotkey).

options.label: Aura Range Visualization
options.tooltip: Display the range of auras of selected units and structures (can also be toggled in-game with the hotkey).

options.label: Heal Range Visualization
options.tooltip: Display the healing range of selected units (can also be toggled in-game with the hotkey).

options.label: Rank icon above status bar
options.tooltip: Show rank icons above status bars.

options.label: Detailed Tooltips
options.tooltip: Show detailed tooltips for trainable units in unit-producing buildings.

options.label: Sort resources and population tooltip
options.tooltip: Dynamically sort players in the resources and population tooltip by value.

options.label: Diplomacy Colors: Self
options.tooltip: Color of your units when diplomacy colors are enabled.

options.label: Diplomacy Colors: Ally
options.tooltip: Color of allies when diplomacy colors are enabled.

options.label: Diplomacy Colors: Neutral
options.tooltip: Color of neutral players when diplomacy colors are enabled.

options.label: Diplomacy Colors: Enemy
options.tooltip: Color of enemies when diplomacy colors are enabled.
